Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Immunocytochemical techniques were used to examine alterations in the expression of neuronal nitric oxide synthase ( NOS ) in bladder pathways following acute and chronic irritation of the urinary tract of the rat .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| acute and chronic irritation of the urinary tract |

In this paragraph, the "Disease" entities refer to the medical conditions that affect the urinary tract of the rat. The specific diseases mentioned are "acute irritation of the urinary tract" and "chronic irritation of the urinary tract." These conditions may not be considered distinct diseases in the same way that, for example, diabetes or cancer are, but they are still medical conditions that affect the body and are therefore relevant to identify in this context.

| acute and chronic irritation of the urinary tract |

In this paragraph, the only entities that clearly refer to medical conditions are "acute irritation of the urinary tract" and "chronic irritation of the urinary tract." These conditions are mentioned in the context of a study examining alterations in the expression of neuronal nitric oxide synthase (NOS) in bladder pathways following these medical conditions. Therefore, these are the entities that should be included in the table as "Disease" entities.
